lead_paragraph: A court in the eastern Chinese province of Anhui has handed out sentences of up to 20 years in jail for 67 people involved in a mafia-style gang that engaged in gambling, extortion and violence, state news agency Xinhua reported on Sunday.
snippet: A court in the eastern Chinese province of Anhui has handed out sentences of up to 20 years in jail for 67 people involved in a mafia-style gang that engaged in gambling, extortion and violence, state news agency Xinhua reported on Sunday....

headline.main: China Jails 67 People for Involvement in Mafia-Style Gang
headline.print_headline: China Jails 67 People for Involvement in Mafia-Style Gang
